Html Helper here...

The purpose of HTML helpers here is to augment Code Igniter platform HTML helpers and to provide a cheap replacement when do you want to disable any template engine support in BareboneMVC framework.

=== `html_options_assoc()` ===

`html_options_assoc()` is a function that creates `<select><option>` group as HTML format string. 

{{{
string html_options_assoc(string name, dictionary values)
string html_options_assoc(string name, dictionary values, variant selected)
string html_options_assoc(string name, dictionary values, variant selected, dictionary params)
}}}

|| *`name`* || The `name` attribute of the `select` tag ||
|| *`values`* || ... ||
|| *`selected`* || ... ||
|| *`params`* || ||
|| *`returns`* || `string` ||
